title: For The E-Sport Quests, How do I Know What Split It Is?
body: Yes, I'm stupid. I thought it was week 4, but I don't really know and I'd feel better if I did.

replies.body: We're actually working on that.  Stay tuned!

>
> We're actually working on that.  Stay tuned!

Was this in reply to my comment, out of curiosity? Or a second reply to the OP? If the former, that's awesome news, and thanks for the update!

Hey Jack!  You're not stupid, it's how we label things across the world and can be confusing!  Each year, there are 2 splits.  In LCS, they are called Spring and Summer.  We have events in there too that are not part of the split itself, so it looks something like this:

Spring Split games -> MSI (not a split) -> Summer Split (weeks 1-4) -> Rift Rivals (not a split) -> Summer Split (weeks 5-10) -> Worlds (not a split) -> All Stars (not a split).

Given this, is it possible we could get some sort of highlight on videos that will give us credit for games watched? I often find myself having to guess!
Ah, so it really is ongoing, haha... Thank you!!
